ygData.subject: RE: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, blame FF.  He start the disease 1st, but I get it more serious than he ;) JA2 is very very cool.  I m also looking for Homeworld, heard it s also very
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, blame FF. He start the disease 1st, but I get it more serious than he
;)

JA2 is very very cool. I'm also looking for Homeworld, heard it's also
very cool from some UO kakis.

Btw, one way to judge if ya enemies can shoot you is whether they look
red/black to you, just like how u decide if u can shoot them. This is just
a 70% rough guide, since sometime ya enemies on roof they can see you but
not vice versa.

Hey I forget how to climb to roof, can teach me? During my 1st mission I
did it once, coz one enemy on roof, but later forget how to go abt doing it
again ;) CGW Nov issue has some good tips on how to rise ya merc's stats
and skills. Worth take a look.

This weekend I will play Baldur's gate expansion : Sword Coast while
waiting for the major UO item patch.

Ziltus


On Thursday, 14 October, 1999 10:40 AM, Ebon Praetor
[SMTP:kelc@...] wrote:
> From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
>
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> > I think I've stopped playing EQ for almost 2 weeks or more, and
> > surprisingly I didn't missed it at all. ;)
> > I login UO once every 2-3 nights, to help my UO guild to settle some
> > training and guild matters, I play Jagged Alliance 2 (wow it's a damn
cool
> > game, the content is really solid), I watch VCDs etc...I just don't
missed
> > EQ, hehe.
>
> I seem to have got what you've got, Ziltus... this "Bored-with-
> levelling-and-nothing-much-else-to-do" EQ disease... you pass to
> me one isit?! *heh*
>
> Anyway, I really enjoy JA2 too... I enjoy it so much, I bought the
> original one... :)
>
> Frankly, the only gripe I have about the game is that it's hard to tell
> whether the enemy can or cannot shoot you if you hide behind this
> rock, or that tree...
>
> I also recently acquired Homeworld... this RTS not easy man...
>
>
> --
>
>
> Love is in the air...
> Get me a gas mask, quick!!!
>
> Cya,
> Praetor
